QUERY.TITLE: Pope ' s Visit in Sri Lanka
QUERY.DESC: Find reports on protests or problems caused by previous declarations of the Pope about Buddhism during his visit to Sri Lanka .
QUERY.NARR: Pope John Paul found a mixed reception waiting when he visited largely Buddhist Sri Lanka . The Pope ' s visit to Sri Lanka proved to be a test of relations between the Catholic_Church and Buddhist leaders following comments about Buddhism in a recently published book .
